title: Personalized Storytelling Sessions
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to engage in personalized storytelling sessions that resonate with my interests, so that I can stimulate my cognitive abilities while enjoying content related to my passion for classical music and my experiences.

title: Gentle Stretching and Mobility Exercises Guidance
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to guide me through gentle stretching and mobility exercises so that I can maintain my independence and manage my joint pain more effectively.

title: Adaptive Learning Modules – Customizable Difficulty Levels for Activities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want activities that adapt to my abilities so that I can engage in cognitive stimulation without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Hydration and Nutrition Check-ins
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to stay hydrated and check my nutrition so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence at home.

title: Calming Music Playlists
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want access to calming music playlists so that I can relax and manage my stress while maintaining my independence at home.

title: Personalized Progress Tracking – Activity Logs for Cognitive and Physical Exercises
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to track my cognitive and physical activities in a way that is easy to understand so that I can monitor my progress and stay motivated in maintaining my health.
